BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON





Birdbot: RY!



Papertron: ERF FER FER FER! Not ma=
ny people like me. They say I'm icky and that I'm a green geek. But I don't=
 care as long as I get to climb in trees. Heh!...

  ----- Original Message=
 -----

 =
   Papertron: HEH! HEH!



    Birdbot: I've took a guys head off before. H=
e wouldn't share so I killed him. I only wanted all 10 boxes of pizza but h=
e only gave me 9 boxes and a half of another one! He had the nerve to keep =
one piece for himself!!!! So I ripped his head off and ate all 10 boxes. An=
d then I woke up all of the neighbors by screaming and singing Barry Manolo=
w.



    Papertron: ERF FER FER FER!!! I have 4 identities. Don't tell any=
one. But right now I'm Papertron. But sometimes I'm Apple Furry Murry, The =
Smelly Guy and The Silly Goon. ERF FER FER FER!!....

essage -----

 I like your styles. So, are you any good at fighting?...

tinky chameleon. Erf fer fer fer! Trespassing? I don't know what that is bu=
t I've been trying to get those peoples attention. I want to live there.


=

        (Birdbot looks at Sarge and stands up straight.)



        Birdbo=
t: RY! All I want is what everyone else is eating! RY! Nothing is wrong wit=
h me accept I hate people when they don't leave me alone! And I hate whiney=
 crying people and laughing people. I want to join this guys too but they k=
eep ignoring us. Do you know one of their names so I can call them out here=
?....

ga

ks at Birdbot.
